document.full_text: hundreds of marchers rallied in chicago and los angeles on saturday for the "slutwalk" movement aimed at dispelling the notion that a sexual assault victim's provocative dress could be responsible for an attack.
document.title: hundreds march in chicago, la to dispel sex assault myths
lines_and_colors: hundreds of marchers rallied in chicago and los angeles on saturday for the "slutwalk" movement aimed at dispelling the notion that a sexual assault victim's provocative dress could be responsible for an attack.
